WorkItem.ClosedComment: This problem does not appear to be in the current release.
WorkItem.Description:
input:

abc

Expect output: abc actual output: abc fix: add h1,h2,h3,h4,h5 in $allowed_children @function h2d_html_allowed_children($tag = NULL) in h2d_htmlconverter.php

Comments.Message: This seems to work for me, and h1-h6 elements are set as allowed children of a div element - are you using the htmltodocx_0.5.2_alpha release (released on the 9th May)?
